attractions.name: 故宫博物院 (Forbidden City Museum)
attractions.location: 景山前街4号, 北京市
attractions.notes: Advanced online booking REQUIRED via official website or WeChat mini-program. Peak season tickets sell out weeks in advance. Visit early morning to avoid crowds. Allow 3-4 hours for full tour. Wear comfortable shoes - extensive walking required. Bring ID for ticket verification. Photography allowed in most areas. Audio guide recommended (rent at entrance or use app).
highlights: 午门 (Meridian Gate) - Main southern entrance
太和殿 (Hall of Supreme Harmony) - Largest palace hall
乾清宫 (Palace of Heavenly Purity) - Emperor's residence
珍宝馆 (Treasure Gallery) - Extra ticket required
钟表馆 (Clock Museum) - Extra ticket required
慈宁宫 (Palace of Compassion and Tranquility)
御花园 (Imperial Garden) - Northern exit area
attractions.booking_info: Online booking MANDATORY. No walk-in tickets available. Book at: https://gugong.ktmtech.cn/ or WeChat Mini Program '故宫博物院'
visitor_tips: Visit on weekdays to avoid weekend crowds
Enter from 午门 (south), exit from 神武门 (north)
Central axis tour takes 2-3 hours minimum
Avoid Chinese holidays and summer peak season
Limited food options inside - eat before or after
Restrooms available but crowded during peak hours
Cloakroom available at entrance for large bags
attractions.accessibility: Wheelchair accessible paths available. Contact in advance for assistance.
attractions.weather_considerations: Indoor/outdoor mixed. Winter can be very cold - dress warmly. Summer can be hot - bring water and sun protection.

notes: 故宫博物院 is one of China's most visited attractions. CRITICAL: Advanced online booking is MANDATORY - no tickets sold at entrance. Based on February 1, 2026 visit date (winter season), opening hours are 08:30-16:30 with last entry at 15:30. Closed on Mondays except holidays. Current adult ticket price is approximately ¥60 (USD ~8-10). Allow minimum 3 hours, recommend 4-5 hours for comprehensive visit including side halls and treasure galleries. Estimated visit duration: 180 minutes (3 hours) for main axis only, 240-300 minutes (4-5 hours) for complete tour.
research_methodology: Used Gaode Maps POI search and detail retrieval to obtain official attraction information including location, hours, rating, and classification. Unable to supplement with RedNote user experiences or weather data due to MCP configuration issues. Information is based on official Gaode Maps data which is authoritative for Chinese attractions.
data_quality: High - Official source data from Gaode Maps. Missing: user-generated tips from RedNote, weather forecast for visit date, Google Maps reviews. Cost estimate based on standard Forbidden City admission pricing (¥60 for adults, 2026 pricing may vary).
